45 class Nasa9DB : public NasaDB<Nasa9Polynomial>
46 {
47 public:
48  Nasa9DB(int arg)
49  { }
50 
51 protected:
55  std::string filename() const {
56  return std::string("nasa9.dat");
57  }
58 
63  void skipHeader(std::ifstream& is) const
64  {
65  // Start by skipping all of the comments
66  std::string line;
67  int length = 0;
68  while (std::getline(is, line)) {
69  length = line.length();
70  line = String::trim(line);
71  if (line != "" && line[0] != '!') break;
72  }
73 
74  // Skip the "thermo" header if it exists
75  if (length > 5 && String::toLowerCase(line.substr(0,6)) == "thermo")
76  std::getline(is, line);
77  // Else put the curser back to the beginning of the line
78  else
79  is.seekg(-static_cast<int>(length+1), std::ios_base::cur);
80  }
81 
85  Species loadSpecies(std::ifstream& is) const
86  {
87  // Skip all comments and blank lines first
88  std::string line;
89  while (std::getline(is, line))
90  if (String::trim(line).length() > 1 && line[0] != '!') break;
91 
92  if (is.eof() || String::toLowerCase(line.substr(0,3)) == "end")
93  return Species();
94 
95  // Species name
96  std::vector<std::string> tokens;
97  std::string name =
98  Utilities::String::tokenize(line.substr(0,24), tokens, " ")[0];
99 
100  // Phase
101  getline(is, line);
102  PhaseType phase;
103  switch (line[51]) {
104  case '0':
105  phase = GAS;
106  break;
107  default:
108  if (name.substr(name.size()-3,3) == "(L)")
109  phase = LIQUID;
110  else
111  phase = SOLID;
112  }
113 
114  // Stoichiometry
115  Species::StoichList stoich;
116  for (size_t i = 10; i < 50; i += 8) {
117  // Element name
118  std::string el = Utilities::String::trim(line.substr(i,2));
119  if (el == "") break;
120 
121  if (el == "E" || el == "E-" || el == "e")
122  el = "e-";
123  else {
124  el[0] = std::toupper(el[0]);
125  el[1] = std::tolower(el[1]);
126  }
127 
128  // Number of atoms
129  int n = (int)std::atof(line.substr(i+2,6).c_str());
130  stoich(el, n);
131  }
132 
133  // Skip over the polynomial data
134  int ranges = std::atoi(line.substr(0,2).c_str());
135 
136  if (ranges == 0)
137  std::getline(is, line);
138  else {
139  for (int i = 0; i < ranges; ++i) {
140  std::getline(is, line);
141  std::getline(is, line);
142  std::getline(is, line);
143  }
144  }
145 
146  return Species(name, phase, stoich);
147  }
148 
153  void loadPolynomials(
154  std::ifstream& is, std::vector<Nasa9Polynomial>& polynomials)
155  {
156  // First build a map of the species names with their indices in order
157  // to speed up the searching for needed names
158  std::map<std::string, size_t> species_names;
159  std::map<std::string, size_t>::iterator iter;
160  for (size_t i = 0; i < species().size(); ++i)
161  species_names.insert(make_pair(species()[i].name(), i));
162 
163  // Keep reading species from file until we have found all the ones we
164  // need
165  std::string line, name;
166  std::vector<std::string> tokens;
167  while (species_names.size() > 0) {
168  // Read each line until encountering a species that we want
169  std::getline(is, line);
170 
171  // Is this the first line of a species that we need?
172  tokens.clear();
173  name =
174  Utilities::String::tokenize(line.substr(0,24), tokens, " ")[0];
175  iter = species_names.find(name);
176  if (iter != species_names.end()) {
177  is.seekg(
178  -static_cast<int>(line.length()+1), std::ios_base::cur) >>
179  polynomials[iter->second];
180  species_names.erase(iter);
181  }
182  }
183  }
184 };
185 
186 // Register this database type
187 Utilities::Config::ObjectProvider<Nasa9DB, ThermoDB> nasa9DB("NASA-9");
188

199 class Nasa9NewDB : public Nasa9DB
200 {
201 public:
202  Nasa9NewDB(int arg) : Nasa9DB(arg)
203  {
204  std::cout
205  << "Warning: the NASA-9-New thermodynamic database is assembled "
206  << "from a collection of sources and is still being vetted. See "
207  << "Scoggins et al. Aerospace Science and Technology 66:177-192, "
208  << "2017. for more details. The name of this database may change "
209  << "in the future." << std::endl;
210  }
211 
212 protected:
216  std::string filename() const {
217  return std::string("nasa9_new.dat");
218  }
219 };
220 
221 // Register this database type
222 Utilities::Config::ObjectProvider<Nasa9NewDB, ThermoDB> nasa9newDB("NASA-9-New");
